posts.name: Erik
posts.cooked: Hi all -  we broke our RoboRio 2 at district event this past weekend and had to go to our Rio1 mid-event.  The RoboRio 2 seems backordered and we couldn’t find a backup to our Rio1 in our network.  Does anyone have an extra Rio1 that we can borrow as backup for this weekend’s event?  We are in Raleigh, NC.

posts.name: Amalan Iyengar
posts.cooked: 4795 has some spare Rio 1s and is in Chapel Hill - PM me or email admin@eastbots.com and we can coordinate pickup

posts.name: Ben Edwards
posts.cooked: Hi guys, we (the Gearcats) have a spare RIO 1 and we’ll bring it to Pitt this weekend for you.

posts.name: Ben Edwards
posts.cooked: BTW, we have a RIO 2 but we don’t trust it, it died completely on us at THOR a couple years ago and it’s been flaky since, suspicious of the SD card slot.  We ran with RIO 1s in 2024 and this year.

posts.name: Ben Edwards
posts.cooked: Found our other spare and reformatted it with the 2025 image and your team number. Hope you won’t need it but we’ll have it at load in Friday

posts.name: Erik
posts.cooked: perfect, thank you so much!  We’ll swing by if we need it!

posts.name: Peter Johnson
posts.cooked:
It seems like you found one, but just a reminder that Spare Parts at events has both RoboRIO 1 and 2’s available for loan for the event duration.

Note: apparently the SD cards for the RoboRIO 2’s may not be stocked, however.

posts.name: Bob Bell
posts.cooked:
Wow, really, your Rio died, too?  Ours also mysteriously went belly-up between Saturday night and Sunday morning.  What are we doing to our Rios, NC?

Peter_Johnson:

just a reminder that Spare Parts at events has both RoboRIO 1 and 2’s available for loan for the event duration

We finished our event with a CSA -loaned Rio 2, for which we are very grateful.
